Class Session

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.Session
public class Session extends Object
A session is one IRIS login session.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Travis Swanston, John Stanley - SRF Consulting

    • createLayers

      public void createLayers(MapBean mb, MapModel mm)
      Create the layer states. The map bean and model must be seperate parameters so that the model can be built before calling setModel on the map bean.
      Parameters:
      mb - Map bean to render the layer states.
      mm - Map model to contain layer states.

    • createTableAction

      public IAction createTableAction(String tname)
      Create an action to create a proxy table form

    • canRead

      public boolean canRead(String tname)
      Check if the user can read a type

    • isWritePermitted

      public boolean isWritePermitted(String tname)
      Check if the user is permitted to write an object, regardless of EDIT mode.
      Parameters:
      tname - Type name of object to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the object

    • isWritePermitted

      public boolean isWritePermitted(String tname, String oname)
      Check if the user is permitted to write an object, regardless of EDIT mode.
      Parameters:
      tname - Type name of object to check.
      oname - Name of object to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the object

    • isWritePermitted

      public boolean isWritePermitted(String tname, String oname, String aname)
      Check if the user is permitted to write an attribute, regardless of EDIT mode.
      Parameters:
      tname - Type name of attribute to check.
      aname - Name of attribute to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the attribute

    • isWritePermitted

      public boolean isWritePermitted(SonarObject proxy)
      Check if the user is permitted to write a proxy, regardless of EDIT mode.
      Parameters:
      proxy - Proxy object to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the attribute

    • isWritePermitted

      public boolean isWritePermitted(SonarObject proxy, String aname)
      Check if the user is permitted to write a proxy attribute, regardless of EDIT mode.
      Parameters:
      proxy - Proxy object to check.
      aname - Name of attribute to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the attribute

    • canWrite

      public boolean canWrite(String tname, boolean can_edit)
      Check if the user can write an attribute.
      Parameters:
      tname - Type name of attribute to check.
      can_edit - Flag to allow editing.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the attribute

    • canWrite

      public boolean canWrite(String tname, String aname)
      Check if the user can write an attribute.
      Parameters:
      tname - Type name of attribute to check.
      aname - Name of attribute to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the attribute

    • canWrite

      public boolean canWrite(String tname)
      Check if the user can write an attribute.
      Parameters:
      tname - Type name of attribute to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the attribute

    • canWrite

      public boolean canWrite(SonarObject proxy)
      Check if the user can write a proxy attribute.
      Parameters:
      proxy - Proxy object to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the attribute

    • canWrite

      public boolean canWrite(SonarObject proxy, String aname)
      Check if the user can write a proxy attribute.
      Parameters:
      proxy - Proxy object to check.
      aname - Name of attribute to check.
      Returns:
      true if user can write the attribute

    • getCurrent

      public static Session getCurrent()
